title: 94/196/EC: Council Decision of 29 March 1994 appointing an alternate member of the Committee of the Regions
header:
COUNCIL DECISION of 29 March 1994 appointing an alternate member of the Committee of the Regions (94/196/EC)
THE COUNCIL OF THE EUROPEAN UNION
recitals:
,
Having regard to the Treaty establishing the European Community, and in particular Article 198a thereof,
Having regard to the Council Decision of 26 January 1994 appointing the members and alternate members of the Committee of the Regions for the period 26 January 1994 to 25 January 1998 (1),
Whereas a seat of alternate member on the Committee has become vacant following the resignation of Dr Giancarlo Bolognini, which was brought to the Council's attention on 10 March 1994;
Having regard to the proposal from the Italian Government,
main_body: Dr Michele Di Puppo is hereby appointed an alternate member of the Committee of the Regions in place of Dr Giancarlo Bolognini for the remainder of his term of office, which expires on 25 January 1998.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 29 March 1994.
For the Council
The President
G. MORAITIS
(1) OJ No L 31, 4. 2. 1994, p. 29.
